main event: Several observers saw an object to the north of the city moving rapidly and erratically at a high altitude in Kingsville, Louisiana.
interesting points: The object was visible for about 1-2 minutes., The object was followed by Air Defense radar., Initially thought to be a balloon but later identified as a satellite., The object changed direction and speed during the observation., The sighting occurred at night under clear conditions.
witness description: Service station operator, reliability unknown, previously a radar operator in the US Navy.
